room_title: Escape room "7 Blocks" by Escape Joplin in Joplin
room_description: You are the first officers on scene to check out a suspicious package. After some quick investigating, you realize the threat is a bomb big enough to destroy seven city blocks. The bomb squad is on their way but stuck in rush hour traffic. There isn’t enough time to evacuate everyone to safety, so you must follow the bomb squad’s instructions to disarm the device. Become the heroes and save the city before time runs out.
